en: What are the vegetables available with you?

te: వంకాయలూ, బీరకాయలూ, టొమేటోలూ, చిక్కుడుకాయలూ, దోసకాయలూ, కేబేజీ ఉన్నాయండీ!
en: Brinjal, ridge gourd, tomato, beans, cucumber and cabbage are available, sir.
hi: बैगन, बीरकाया, टमाटर, सेम, खीरा, और पत्ता गोभी हैं जी!

en: Amaranth (tōtākūrā), spinach (pālākūrā), gōngūrā (sour spinach) are available, sir.
hi: अमरंथ, पालक, बच्चलिकूरा, और गोंगूरा हैं जी।

en: What is the price of brinjal?
How much does the cabbage cost?

te: వంకాయలు ఒక కిలో, బీరకాయలు రెండు కిలోలు ఇవ్వు.
en: Give me a kilogram of brinjal and two kilograms of bīrakāy.
hi: बैगन एक किलो और बीरकाया दो किलो दीजिए।

en: Give a kg of cabbage too.
This cabbage is weighing one and a half kg, sir!
Give me a quarter kg of green chillies.
Is there any city bus now?
What is the time now, sir?

hi: आपके दोस्त का घर कहाँ है?
सरोज के घर के पास है।

en: Their houses are near our school.
hi: उनके घर हमारे स्कूल के पास ही हैं।

en: Is Saroja's house near our school?
hi: सरोज का घर हमारे स्कूल के पास ही है क्या?

en: Some of them are my younger brother's.
Some of them are his friend's.
They are from the same school.
hi: उन दोनों का स्कूल एक ही है।

en: sharp angled cucumber / ridge gourd / chinese okra
